You provide us information about yourself, such as your name and e-mail address, if you register for an account with Amaken, These information will be used to provide you with a custom experience and allow recommendations according the information provided

 We may use your email address to send you Service-related notices (including any notices required by law, in lieu of communication by postal mail). We may also use your contact information to send you reports about unethical messages posted by the users on your property if you are a business user.

 We will use your informations to provide you wiht the following:

 *Your eamil address will be used to allow you to recive notification and updated about your account
 *Your city and country will be used to provide you with custom experince within the app, this will help our recommender system tp allow us recommend places according to your city and country.
 *Your place or event info will be used to promote for your business within the app and among our users.
